notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: A.G. conceived, designed and organized the study and wrote the manuscript; T.S. performed all data analysis, helped interpret results and wrote the methods section; S.D.P. contributed preliminary results; R.E.S.C. and K.G. contributed to the interpretation of results; D.D.W.P., M.D.D., D.A.L., D.D.C., J.K. and F.M.R. helped motivate the work, reviewed the original manuscript and made valuable suggestions. Finally, A.G. and T.S. revised the manuscript.
